Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka and India have played 2 matches in the series, with Sri Lanka winning 1 game.
Jeffrey Vandersay was the Man of the Match in the previous encounter and scored the highest fantasy points for Sri Lanka with 199 match fantasy points.
Washington Sundar topped the fantasy points leaderboard for India with 114 match fantasy points in the previous encounter.
The pitch at the R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo is a balanced pitch with an average 1st innings score of 217 runs in the last 20 matches.
The team batting first at this venue has won 58% of its matches.
Temperature is expected to be around 28.85 °C with 75% humidity and 5.56 m/s winds. Cloud cover is expected, which may aid pace bowlers.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
In the 170 matches played between these 2 teams, bowlers of both teams have earned the most fantasy points for their respective teams so far.
